            <script type="text/javascript">
             (function ($) {
		$(function () {
			var numberOfPressReleases = 5,
				language = 'sv',
				webApiUrl = '',
				pressReleasesMarkup = [],
				pressRoomPageId = 16205,
				myNewsdeskPressReleasesList = $('.myNewsdeskPressReleasesList'),
				myNewsdeskLoadingLayer = $('.myNewsdeskLoadingLayer'),
				myNewsdeskContentLayer = $('.myNewsdeskContentLayer'),
				myNewsdeskErrorLayer = $('.myNewsdeskErrorLayer'),
				myNewsdeskPressReleasesList = $('.myNewsdeskPressReleasesList');

			webApiUrl = '/webapi/mynewsdeskapiproxy/getpressreleases?numberofpressreleases=' + numberOfPressReleases + '&pressroompageid=' + pressRoomPageId;
			if (language === "sv") {
				webApiUrl = webApiUrl + '&language=sv';
			}
			else {
				webApiUrl = webApiUrl + '&language=en';
			}

			$.getJSON(webApiUrl)
			.done(function (data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
				for (var pressReleaseIndex = 0, pressReleaseCount = data.length; pressReleaseIndex < pressReleaseCount; pressReleaseIndex++) {
					pressReleasesMarkup.push(getPressReleaseItemMarkup(data[pressReleaseIndex]));
				}
				myNewsdeskPressReleasesList.append(pressReleasesMarkup.join(''));
				myNewsdeskLoadingLayer.hide();
				if (ELMIA.Cookies.getCookie('MyNewsdeskPressReleases').length > 0) {
					myNewsdeskContentLayer.show();
				}
				else {
					ELMIA.Cookies.setCookie('MyNewsdeskPressReleases', 'MyNewsdeskPressReleases', 30);
					myNewsdeskContentLayer.slideDown(700);
				}
			})
			.fail(function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
				myNewsdeskLoadingLayer.hide();
				myNewsdeskErrorLayer.show();
			});

			function getPressReleaseItemMarkup(pressReleaseItem) {
				var markup = [];
				markup.push('<li>');
				markup.push('<h3>');
				markup.push('<span>');
				markup.push(pressReleaseItem.origin);
				markup.push('</span>');
				markup.push('<a href=\"' + pressReleaseItem.url + '\">');
				markup.push(pressReleaseItem.header);
				markup.push('</a>');
				markup.push('</h3>');
				markup.push('<p>');
				markup.push('<strong>');
				markup.push(pressReleaseItem.summary);
				markup.push('</strong>');
				markup.push('</p>');
				markup.push('<p>');
				markup.push('<span class=\"date\">');
				markup.push(pressReleaseItem.published);
				markup.push('</span>');
				markup.push('</p>');
				markup.push('</li>');
				return markup.join('');
			}
		});
	})(jQuery);
            </script>
